scenes.voiceover: Our story begins in the highlands of Ethiopia, around the 9th century. Legend tells of a goat herder named Kaldi...
scenes.visual_prompt: A photorealistic wide shot of the Ethiopian highlands, bathed in golden morning light. A lone goat herder, Kaldi, in traditional clothing, looks surprised as his goats prance excitedly around a small coffee plant with bright red berries. Cinematic lighting, shallow depth of field.

scenes.voiceover: ...who noticed his goats behaving unusually energetic after eating berries from a certain tree.
scenes.visual_prompt: Close-up shot of the coffee berries on the tree, gleaming red in the sunlight. One goat is animated with slight, exaggerated energetic movements (jumping, head-butting playfully). Focus on the berries.

scenes.voiceover: These berries were coffee! Soon, the stimulating effects of coffee were being explored by monks in monasteries.
scenes.visual_prompt: Interior of an ancient, dimly lit Ethiopian monastery. A monk, with a peaceful but focused expression, is carefully roasting coffee beans over a small fire. Smoke gently rises. A simple wooden table has a pot brewing coffee.

scenes.voiceover: By the 15th century, coffee had spread to the Arabian Peninsula. Coffee houses, or 'qahveh khaneh,' became centers for social and intellectual life.
scenes.visual_prompt: A bustling Arabian coffee house in the 15th century. People are gathered, drinking coffee, playing backgammon, and engaged in lively conversations. Lanterns illuminate the scene, creating warm and inviting lighting.

scenes.voiceover: From there, coffee journeyed to Europe, and then across the globe, becoming the beloved beverage we know today.
scenes.visual_prompt: A montage of quick cuts: a European coffee shop in the 17th century; a modern coffee plantation in South America; a person in a modern city holding a coffee cup with steam rising. The final shot shows a diverse group of people enjoying coffee together.

scenes.voiceover: So, next time you enjoy a cup, remember its rich and fascinating history!
scenes.visual_prompt: A close-up shot of a perfectly brewed cup of coffee, with crema swirling on top. Steam gently rises. Sunlight streams through a window, highlighting the coffee's texture.
